data.message: So why can't I just see whatever everyone on my friends list in the order of most recent post instead of this algorithm you guys came up with for my news feed? And I also don't enjoy notifications about someone being on facebook live. Not really that important at all.

replies.message:
Hey Walter. We've invested a lot to understand how News Feed can show the most engaging content to the majority of people. Top Stories is the result of our findings, which is why it is the default. We know that some people prefer the Most Recent view, so we've kept this option available. If you have specific thoughts you want to share, please let us know here: http://bit.ly/2gISQhg.
You can turn off Live video notifications by adjusting your settings. To get started, simply select your preference under Live Videos: http://bit.ly/2ghxG9q. -Joe
